title: Part A - Constructed Bar Graph
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

  • Axes correctly labeled

  • Axes correctly scaled

  • Data correctly plotted as a bar graph with pH as the independent variable
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points.

3 points maximum

  • Axes correctly labeled

  • Axes correctly scaled

  • Data correctly plotted as a bar graph with pH as the independent variable

Student response earns one of the following points.

3 points maximum

  • Axes correctly scaled

  • Data correctly plotted as a bar graph with pH as the independent variable

Student response earns two of the following points.

3 points maximum

  • Axes correctly labeled

  • Axes correctly scaled

  • Data correctly plotted as a bar graph with pH as the independent variable

Student response earns three of the following points.

3 points maximum

  • Axes correctly labeled

  • Axes correctly scaled

  • Data correctly plotted as a bar graph with pH as the independent variable
